original_text: I belong to the same family as they do. They are my own people. I really want them to believe in Christ too. If it would help them, I would even ask God to curse me. I would ask him to make me separate from Christ.
korean_text: 나의 형제 곧 골육의 친척을 위하여 내 자신이 저주를 받아 그리스도에게서 끊어질지라도 원하는 바로라

sentences.original_text: I belong to the same family as they do.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들과 같은 가족에 속해 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: I really want them to believe in Christ too.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 정말로 그들도 그리스도를 믿기를 원합니다.

sentences.original_text: I would even ask God to curse me.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 심지어 하나님께 저를 저주해달라고 구할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: I would ask him to make me separate from Christ.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그리스도에게서 저를 분리시켜달라고 그에게 구할 것입니다.
